Overview   Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.pircbotx.hooks.events

All supported events of PircBotX

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ActionEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called whenever an ACTION is sent from a user.
ChannelInfoEvent<T extends PircBotX> After calling the listChannels() method in PircBotX, the server will start to send us information about each channel on the server.
ConnectEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched once we successfully connected to the IRC server.
DisconnectEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched when we get disconnected.
FileTransferFinishedEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event gets dispatched when a DccFileTransfer has finished.
FingerEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a FINGER request.
HalfOpEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets halfop status granted in a channel.
IncomingChatRequestEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event will be dispatched whenever a DCC Chat request is received.
IncomingFileTransferEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever a DCC SEND request is sent to the PircBotX.
InviteEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when we are invited to a channel by a user.
JoinEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) joins a channel which we are on.
KickEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) is kicked from any of the channels that we are in.
MessageEvent<T extends PircBotX> Used whenever a message is sent to a channel.
ModeEvent<T extends PircBotX> Used when the mode of a channel is set.
MotdEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched when the Motd is finished being sent.
NickChangeEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) changes nick on any of the channels that we are on.
NoticeEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a notice.
OpEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets granted operator status for a channel.
OwnerEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets owner status granted in a channel.
PartEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) parts a channel which we are on.
PingEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a PING request from another user.
PrivateMessageEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever a private message is sent to us.
QuitEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) quits from the server.
RemoveChannelBanEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a hostmask ban is removed from a channel.
RemoveChannelKeyEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel key is removed.
RemoveChannelLimitEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when the user limit is removed for a channel.
RemoveInviteOnlyEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel has 'invite only' removed.
RemoveModeratedEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel has moderated mode removed.
RemoveNoExternalMessagesEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is set to allow messages from any user, even if they are not actually in the channel.
RemovePrivateEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is marked as not being in private mode.
RemoveSecretEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel has 'secret' mode removed.
RemoveTopicProtectionEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when topic protection is removed for a channel.
ServerPingEvent<T extends PircBotX> The actions to perform when a PING request comes from the server.
ServerResponseEvent<T extends PircBotX> This is called when we receive a numeric response from the IRC server.
SetChannelBanEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets banned from a channel.
SetChannelKeyEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel key is set.
SetChannelLimitEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user limit is set for a channel.
SetInviteOnlyEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is set to 'invite only' mode.
SetModeratedEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is set to 'moderated' mode.
SetNoExternalMessagesEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is set to only allow messages from users that are in the channel.
SetPrivateEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is marked as being in private mode.
SetSecretEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a channel is set to be in 'secret' mode.
SetTopicProtectionEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when topic protection is enabled for a channel.
SuperOpEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets superop status granted in a channel.
TimeEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a TIME request.
TopicEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever a user sets the topic, or when we join a new channel and discovers its topic.
UnknownEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a line from the server that PircBotX has not been programmed to recognize.
UserListEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched when we receive a user list from the server after joining a channel.
UserModeEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when the mode of a user is set.
VersionEvent<T extends PircBotX> This event is dispatched whenever we receive a VERSION request.
VoiceEvent<T extends PircBotX> Called when a user (possibly us) gets voice status granted in a channel.
 

Package org.pircbotx.hooks.events Description

All supported events of PircBotX
